ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Druid flying solo, mostly.
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, I tried that once as a newbie. Boy was I dumb! But there is a Druid port in there. ~Daikun Shadow Knight and Guardian of Innoruuk Karana Server ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, I tried that once as a newbie. Boy was I dumb! But there is a Druid
port in there.


~Daikun
Shadow Knight and Guardian of Innoruuk
Karana Server
